page.title: 03THE HEADMASTER
page.content: Mr Addis has been at Geddington School for 7 years. He usually arrives here at 8.15am and on a normal day returns home at about 5.30pm. His present class of 18 is the smallest he has ever had. His favourite event during the year is the Christmas Production. He also likes Mathematics. Mr Addis is very grateful to the Parent's Association for raising money for the school. The football teams he has trained have never been poor. His most severe punishment now is a smack; before children had the slipper. Other jobs Mr Addis does are unblocking drains and getting tennis balls off the roof.
